testCase.name: OrderItemStatus Post ListingItemTemplate to create ListingItem
OrderItemStatus Should return an empty list since there are no Bids or Orders yet
OrderItemStatus Should post a Bid for a ListingItem
OrderItemStatus Bid should have been created on buyer node after posting the MPA_BID, BidMessageType.MPA_BID
OrderItemStatus Should get OrderItemStatus from buyer node (bidtype=MPA_BID)
OrderItemStatus SELLER RECEIVES MPA_BID posted from buyers node, BidMessageType.MPA_BID
OrderItemStatus Should get OrderItemStatus from seller node (bidtype=MPA_BID)
OrderItemStatus Should get OrderItemStatus from seller node (bidtype=MPA_ACCEPT, orderStatus=AWAITING_ESCROW)
OrderItemStatus Order should have been created on seller node after posting the MPA_ACCEPT
OrderItemStatus BUYER RECEIVES MPA_ACCEPT posted from sellers node, BidMessageType.MPA_ACCEPT
OrderItemStatus Order should have been created on buyer node after receiving the MPA_ACCEPT, OrderStatus.AWAITING_ESCROW
OrderItemStatus Should get OrderItemStatus from buyer node (bidtype=MPA_ACCEPT, orderStatus=AWAITING_ESCROW)
